text: Angular 17: Bootcamp of Angular at the IT Academy of Barcelona Activa. Angular Material 17, Bootstrap 5, Flex-Layout, Grid-Layout, Signals, Rxjs, etc. June-January 2023-2024. 100% final note (excellent).
